title: Chats in Tech: Tech in Education!
description:
Welcome back to the monthly tech podcast with 'Chats in Tech' this time we see Leo and Justin discussing how to use technology in the realm of education, from AI to zoom calls and beyond!

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!
